subject.topic: Coffman, Nicholas; Crider, Isaac; Snoddy, Thos.

mods.note: Two warrants order any sworn officer of Jefferson County, TN to summon Isaac Crider to appear before a Justice of the Peace. Justice Thos. Snoddy issued and signed the first warrant. Crider had written a note in 1825 promising to pay Nicholas Coffman for services rendered. Crider was summoned in 1827 to answer two pleas of debt to Coffman, the first plea amounting to less than $30 and the second to less than $10.
